text: The Inirida worm lizard (Mesobaena huebneri) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Venezuela and Colombia. ==References== Category:Mesobaena Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 1925 Category:Taxa named by Robert Mertens
title: Inirida worm lizard
